## IOptionalKeywordArgumentOptions interface

Extend [IKeywordArgumentCommonOptions](./program-builder.ikeywordargumentcommonoptions.md) with the default value for a flag.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface IOptionalKeywordArgumentOptions<K extends string, V> extends IKeywordArgumentCommonOptions<K> 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [default](./program-builder.ioptionalkeywordargumentoptions.default.md) | <code>V</code> | The default value for the flag. |
